summary: A richer more brought to life retexture of the first dragonborn!
descriptionHtml:
This has to be my longest retexture yet and I\'m very proud of it.
Once again I was sadden to see how Beth missed the mark on Miraak like they did with so many others. I mean no wonder he was killing dragons, they put him in washed out rags XD I\\\'d be angry to!

I\\\'ll probably do all the dragon priest masks in the future both from Dragonborn and the Base game

NMM

or

Manual: drag and drop the textures/meshes into your data folder

*Please do not reupload

My other mods:

Bloodskal as seen in the pictures: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31359/

Cultist Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31362/
author: Zazil
